entry.title: Photoelectron Spectroscopic Determination of the Interfacial Energetics of Metal Oxide Protection Layers on p-InP Photocathodes
entry.content:
Authors: D Covelli, AZ Ye, JM Evans, TA Schaller, XE Shen... - The Journal of Physical ..., 2026

Abstract: The interfacial energetics between p-type InP and a series of metal oxides, including TiO 2 , Nb 2 O 5 , Ta 2 O 5 , and HfO 2 , were evaluated using X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy, ultraviolet photoelectron spectroscopy, and optical absorption ...

Alert: JL bean (keyword alert)
